titles: An enquiry into the new opinions, chiefly propagated by the Presbyterians of Scotland together with some animadversions on a late book, entitled, A defence of The vindication of the kirk : in a letter to a friend at Edinburgh / by A.M., D.D.
author: Monro, Alexander, d. 1715?
notes: Attributed to Alexander Monro.  Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701. --  Defence of The vindication of the Church of Scotland.
